General.Name: Impiana Hotels Bhd
General.Description: Impiana Hotels Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the management, operation, ownership, and development of hotels and resorts in Malaysia. The company operates through three segments: Hospitality Business, Property Development, and Others. It is also involved in the property investment; hotel and property development; and provision of consultancy services, as well as professional management services to hotels, resorts, and recreation clubs; and related services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
